allow:
Bash(git commit --amend -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
THIS IS A CHECKPOINT, LOOKING GOOD SO FAR

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove unused components that were causing build failure

Delete NavBar, Controls, and old section components \(FrequencyExplorer,
ScaleExplorer, ChordExplorer, IntervalTrainer\) left over from pre-redesign.
NavBar.tsx referenced stale Page type values, breaking TypeScript compilation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
